title: Retro Bowl
description: The ultimate American football management game. Manage your team, call the plays, and win the Bowl.

title: Galaxy Clicker
description: Galaxy Clicker is an idle game featuring different planets, stars, and star systems. Earn income as planets revolve and merge them to grow your universe.

title: Subway Surfers
description: Dash as fast as you can! Dodge the oncoming trains in the most famous endless runner.

title: Growden.io
description: A multiplayer IO game where you grow and compete for territory in a vibrant garden.

title: Ragdoll Hit
description: A physics-based ragdoll fighting game. Use your surroundings and momentum to defeat your enemies.

title: Stickman Hook
description: Swing like a spider! Tap to hook and make incredible jumps in this addictive platformer.

title: Ragdoll Archers
description: Aim and shoot arrows at other ragdolls in this high-stakes physics archery game.

title: Tag
description: Classic game of tag! Run, jump, and dodge to avoid being 'it' in various arenas.

title: YoHoHo.io
description: Become the ultimate pirate king! Battle other pirates and collect gold to grow larger in this fun IO arena.

title: Paper.io 2
description: Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition. A smooth drawing experience!

title: Chicken Clicker
description: A fun idle game where you help a fearless chicken soar higher and uncover bizarre realms. Click to build your egg empire.

title: Basket Random
description: Funny physics-based basketball with random players and courts. One button fun.

title: Soccer Random
description: One-button soccer with ridiculous physics. Goal-scoring madness.

title: Boxing Random
description: Ragdoll boxing fun. Land a punch to win in various environments.

title: Volley Random
description: Ridiculous physics volleyball. Compete with weird physics in various environments.
